comments.body:
Found Issue for Display Setting : 

||*Display Resolution is 1920 x 1080*
*Scale is 150% (Recommended for default Laptop)*||
|The Tracking Detail wording when Scale is 150% slightly piled up
!image-20231220-080446.png|width=91.66666666666667%!
See the different in link below
[https://jam.dev/c/ad82a03a-fb24-4f9b-b978-e8b580de4790|https://jam.dev/c/ad82a03a-fb24-4f9b-b978-e8b580de4790|smart-link]|

Status : *FIXED* and *PASSED* (/)

Found Issue for Button Play n Pause : 

||*Button Play n Pause when it played slightly collides with the line*||
|!image-20231220-080739.png|width=91.66666666666667%!
See the detail in link below
[https://jam.dev/c/0962ff8e-4aee-4087-9520-379bbfb037a1|https://jam.dev/c/0962ff8e-4aee-4087-9520-379bbfb037a1|smart-link]|

Status : *FIXED* and *PASSED* (/)

Found Issue for Date Picker : 

||*Date Picker Bar slightly not alligned*||
|!image-20231220-081910.png|width=91.66666666666667%!|
